item.title: I Just Noticed The Weirdest Thing About Palpatine's Jedi Lie In Revenge Of The Sith
item.description: In Revenge of the Sith, Palpatine lied to convince the galaxy that the Jedi had deserved to die during Order 66, but there's something odd about this.

item.title: The Breakfast Club Cast Reunites For The First Time In 40 Years
item.description: The Breakfast Club main cast comes back together for the first time in 40 years, reuniting on the stage of Chicago Comic and Entertainment Expo.

item.title: 10 Sad Books Guaranteed To Make You Cry
item.description: Sometimes readers need a story that evokes intense emotions, and thankfully, there are plenty of books that will do just that.
